gmacsr 0.1
  • Reference

Calculate Growth Transition Matrix from Parameters

Source: R/gmacs_calc_growth_trans.R
gmacs_calc_growth_trans.Rd

Produces growth transition matrix provided parameters and dimensions

gmacs_calc_growth_trans(gpars, n_size_bins, size_breaks, type)

Arguments

gpars

Growth parameters list in same order as .ctl file.

n_size_bins

Number of size classes.

size_breaks

Breaks between size classes, vector of length n_size_bins + 1.

type

Growth parameterization corresponding to GMACS option. Currently only type = 7 is available.

Value

Growth transition matrix

Examples

gmacs_calc_growth_trans(gpars = list(161, 0.35, 0.05, 0.05), n_size_bins = 13, size_breaks = seq(40, 170, 10), type = 7)
#> Error in gmacs_calc_growth_trans(gpars = list(161, 0.35, 0.05, 0.05),     n_size_bins = 13, size_breaks = seq(40, 170, 10), type = 7): object 'SigmaKappa' not found
